snippet: The Durham police charged North Carolina’s leading scorer, P. J. Hairston, with marijuana possession after a traffic stop.
lead_paragraph: The Durham police charged North Carolina’s leading scorer, P. J. Hairston, with marijuana possession after a traffic stop.

headline.seo: North Carolina’s P.J. Hairston Charged With Marijuana Possession
